content: happy when the circle in fully secured add further stitches to the head to ensure it is fully secure and to adjust its position if you want to make it look up more etc making sure the legs are tightly stuffed so they can support the weight if you want chunkier legs single_crochet 10 instead of 8 pin the legs underneath the shell/body to check you are happy with their position in the example the front legs are sewn underneath the v of the front african flowers either side of the head and the back legs are sewn underneath the v of the two back flowers sew the legs on tightly and then hide the yarn ends inside the tortoise pattern is based on granny square tortoise by brigitte read
